title: RIOT, last game Client crashed.
body:
So they remade as soon as I could get back into game.
I better not get reprimanded for that. Also, I'll never use your new client again. It is way TOO buggy and crashes every other game.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

now I have:
You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors.

This is so unfair.
Your own client is incompetent and players are getting punished for it.

replies.body:
Your loot eligibility is only affected for the match you disconnected from, the message didn't mean all matches going forward. I just wanted to clarify that.

If you experience further issues with the client, let me know so we can troubleshoot them together. If you have any other questions, let me know.
Not to mention, my first game of the day, I got stuck to a wall and couldn't move....... --_-
